Package org.action.application

Class Application

java.lang.Object
org.action.application.Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
Act
public class Application extends Object implements Act
This class encapsulates all the information and business logic for managing a housing application through its entire lifecycle, including state transitions, withdrawal requests, and status tracking.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Application.ApplicationStatus
    Represents the possible states of an application status in the system.
    static enum 
    Application.WithdrawalStatus
    Represents the possible states of a withdrawal request for an application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(String applicationId, String applicantId, String projectId, Application.ApplicationStatus status, Application.WithdrawalStatus withdrawStatus, String openingDate, String closingDate, String flatType)
      Constructs a new Application with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique ID for the application
      applicantId - ID of the applicant who submitted the application
      projectId - ID of the housing project being applied for
      status - Current status of the application
      withdrawStatus - Withdrawal status of the application
      openingDate - Date when the application was submitted (ISO format)
      closingDate - Date when the application was closed (ISO format), or empty string if not closed
      flatType - Type of flat being applied for

  • Method Details

    • view

      public String view()
      Returns a string representation of the application details. If the application has been withdrawn, returns a message indicating that the application cannot be viewed.
      Specified by:
      view in interface Act
      Returns:
      A string containing the application details

    • acceptApplication

      public void acceptApplication()
      Changes the application status to SUCCESSFUL if it is currently PENDING. This indicates the applicant is invited to book a flat. Prints a confirmation message or an error if the status transition is not allowed.

    • book_flat

      public void book_flat()
      Changes the application status to BOOKED if it is currently SUCCESSFUL. Sets the closing date to the current date. Prints a confirmation message or an error if the status transition is not allowed.

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication()
      Changes the application status to UNSUCCESSFUL if it is currently PENDING. Sets the closing date to the current date. Prints a confirmation message or an error if the status transition is not allowed.

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()
      Initiates a withdrawal request for the application. Sets the withdrawal status to PENDING if the application is not already withdrawn. Prints an error message if the application is already withdrawn.

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal()
      Approves a pending withdrawal request. Changes the withdrawal status to WITHDRAWN and the application status to WITHDRAWN. Sets the closing date to the current date. Prints a confirmation message or an error if there is no pending withdrawal.

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal()
      Rejects a pending withdrawal request. Changes the withdrawal status to REJECTED. Prints a confirmation message or an error if there is no pending withdrawal.

    • filter

      public boolean filter(String userId, String projectId, String applicationId, List<Application.ApplicationStatus> statusBlacklist)
      Filters applications based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      userId - Filter by applicant ID
      projectId - Filter by project ID
      applicationId - Filter by application ID
      statusBlacklist - List of application statuses to exclude
      Returns:
      true if the application matches all provided criteria
